name: ENIGMA (itch) (David Eammano)
description:
A 4 month project made by Vanguard Productions, a team of 6 consisting of 1 Designer, 1 Programmer and 4 Artists.

A story driven side scrolling platformer, where the player goes on a journey with an orphaned female character whose goal is to find her mother in this post-apocalyptic diesel-punk world. 

Twitter - @Vanguard_Enigma
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/VanguardProductionsEnigma
